Dispersing Shot.name: Dispersing Shot
Dispersing Shot.fullText:
Daring Slinger Attack 20Dispersing Shot

You let fly a forceful shot that shatters armor, flesh, and bone, knocking your enemy senseless.

Daily        Martial, Reliable, Weapon
Standard Action      Ranged weapon

Requirement: You must be wielding a sling.

Target: One creature

Attack: Dexterity vs. AC

Hit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed and slowed (save ends both). If you have combat advantage against the target, it is immobilized instead of slowed.

  Aftereffect: The target grants combat advantage (save ends).


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 74.
Dispersing Shot.flavor: You let fly a forceful shot that shatters armor, flesh, and bone, knocking your enemy senseless.

  Aftereffect: The target grants combat advantage (save ends).

Instructive Miss.name: Instructive Miss
Instructive Miss.fullText:
Daring Slinger Utility 12Instructive Miss

Your shot goes wide, but now you have your foe in your sights.

Daily        Martial
Free Action      Personal

Trigger: You don’t hit with an encounter attack power using a sling

Effect: You regain the use of the encounter attack power.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 74.
Instructive Miss.flavor: Your shot goes wide, but now you have your foe in your sights.
Instructive Miss.range:
Personal

Scattershot.name: Scattershot
Scattershot.fullText:
Daring Slinger Attack 11Scattershot

You hurl several stones at once, knocking your enemies back with each strike.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Ranged weapon

Requirement: You must be wielding a sling.

Target: One, two, or three creatures

Attack: Dexterity vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 74.
